definitions.text: a cunning or deceitful action or device
examples: he played a trick on me
he pulled a fast one and got away with it

definitions.text: a period of work or duty
an attempt to get you to do something foolish or imprudent
examples: that offer was a dirty trick

definitions.text: a ludicrous or grotesque act done for fun and amusement
an illusory feat; considered magical by naive observers
(card games) in a single round, the sequence of cards played by all the players; the high card is the winner

examples: We tricked the teacher into thinking that class would be cancelled next week
